article_title: Commentary: Compromise is a losing battle for Supreme Court
article_text:
By Noah Feldman

Bloomberg View

Posted Apr 15, 2016 at 9:00 AM

Updated Apr 15, 2016 at 9:27 AM

article_metadata.description: The briefs are in — and the Supreme Court's extraordinary effort to bring about a compromise in a contraceptive care case looks like a bust. Instead of finding a mutually agreeable solution, religious groups and the federal government appear to have only hardened their positions.In simultaneous filings late Tuesday night, each side took the opportunity to strengthen their arguments over how religious organizations go about seeking an exemption to the mandate for providing employees
article_metadata.author: Noah Feldman Bloomberg View
